title: David Patterson (That Dude in Blue)
description:
David Patterson, AKA That Dude in Blue, and an automotive YouTuber. He's known for driving heavily modified cars, his project 240SX, and his show, "Judge my Ride".

 

Watch his stuff here

Follow him on IG:  @ThatDudeinBlue
